HomePage.title: Fighting for All Animals
HomePage.paragraph: We rescue, heal, and protect abandoned, injured, and neglected animals, giving them safety, love, and the chance to live freely. Every life matters, and every animal deserves a place to call home.

1.heading: Some tips from Animal Shepherd
1.title: Tip #1
1.body: Play with your pet both indoors and outdoors.

2.heading: Adopt 2 better than 1
2.title: Tip #2
2.body: The best friend of an animal is always another animal. If you can, adopt two rather than one.

3.heading: Always healthy food
3.title: Tip #3
3.body: Try vegan options for your pet; it is much healthier and will extend their life.

4.heading: Avoid extreme heat
4.title: Tip #4
4.body: Avoid walking them during hot hours and consider getting pet health insurance.

5.heading: Cats are incredible
5.title: Tip #5
5.body: Cats are amazing beings: fun, loving, and healing. Share your life with a rescued cat.

6.heading: Do not confine them
6.title: Tip #6
6.body: Keep your pets free, not in cages. Adopting them only to keep them confined is cruel and unfair.

7.heading: Give your time
7.title: Tip #7
7.body: Dedicate your time and effort to meaningful causes. Altruism is the future of the planet.

8.heading: Regular vet visits
8.title: Tip #8
8.body: Take your pet to the vet regularly. They live fewer years than we do and deserve proper care.

9.heading: Home baths
9.title: Tip #9
9.body: Did you know bathing your pet yourself strengthens your bond.

11.heading: Enjoy your pet
11.title: Tip #11
11.body: Enjoy your pet. Take them for daily walks and, when possible, bring them on countryside adventures.
